mapper.select: SELECT MONTH(pay_date) AS month, SUM(IF(is_income = 0, money, 0)) AS money_out, SUM(IF(is_income = 1, money, 0)) AS money_in FROM payment_record WHERE YEAR(pay_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(pay_date) ORDER BY month

SELECT MONTH(pay_date) AS month, SUM(IF(pd.big_type = 1, money, 0)) AS eat, SUM(IF(pd.big_type = 2, money, 0)) AS run, SUM(IF(pd.big_type = 3, money, 0)) AS home, SUM(IF(pd.big_type = 4, money, 0)) AS play, SUM(IF(pd.big_type = 6, money, 0)) AS life, SUM(IF(pd.big_type = 7, money, 0)) AS buy, SUM(IF(pd.big_type = 9, money, 0)) AS salary FROM payment_record pr LEFT JOIN payment_dict pd on pr.payment_type = pd.payment_type WHERE YEAR(pay_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(pay_date) ORDER BY month
SELECT SUM(IF(is_income = 0, money, 0)) AS money_out, SUM(IF(is_income = 1, money, 0)) AS money_in FROM payment_record WHERE YEAR(pay_date) = #{year}
SELECT SUM(pr.money) FROM payment_record pr LEFT JOIN payment_dict pd on pr.payment_type = pd.payment_type WHERE pd.big_type IN (1, 3, 6) AND pr.is_income = 0 AND YEAR(pr.pay_date) = #{year}
